document_data.name: Crelt
document_data.Description: Crelt had white hair and a thick, yet groomed white beard. A stern expression was etched on his light-skinned face. He wore [[leather armor]] and carried a [[club]].
document_data.Personality: He was a pleasant individual, but had a dislike for too-helpful people, feeling he could do fine on his own. Crelt took his training as a [[psionicist]] very seriously.
document_data.Abilities: Although he frequently employed his psionic abilities, he was still a generally competent person without them.
document_data.Possessions: He owned a suit of ''leather armor +3'', a ''club +2'', as well as a ''[[ring of invisibility]]''.
document_data.History: Crelt was born blind, and did not venture into the larger world before reaching middle age.
